scripts.minify: npx html-minifier-terser index.html -o minified/index.min.$npm_package_version.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true &&  npx terser badge.js -o minified/badge.min.$npm_package_version.js --compress --mangle --ecma 2020 --toplevel --output beautify=false
